title: Do you know why the codicils are damaged or have marks?
question: Do you know why the codicils are damaged or have marks?
hint: If you know why staples were removed from a codicil, for example, you should tell us as this will reduce delays in processing your application.
codicilsDamageReasonDescriptionTitle: Explain why the codicils are damaged or have marks

codicilsDamageReasonKnown.required: Select ‘yes’ if you know why the codicils are damaged or have marks

codicilsDamageReasonDescription.required: Enter the reason why the codicils are damaged or have marks
